title.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Post-Tsunami Sustainable Livelihoods Programme for the Coastal Communities of Tamil Nadu

description.narrative: The goal of the eight-year programme is to rehabilitate the livelihoods of thousands of tsunami victims along the Tamil Nadu coastal areas, thereby enabling them to return to a stable and productive way of life.
